name: Offroad Milk Tanker Truck Transport Simulator 2017
name_original: Offroad Milk Tanker Truck Transport Simulator 2017
description:
Welcome to new milk transportation game of 2017! It's time to become the milkman and transport the farm milk in hill areas by driving a big Milk Tank Truck. Fasten your seat belts and get control of a heavy big tanker which has a capacity of storing a very large amount of dairy milk. To drive heavy truck on hill areas and transport fresh milk is a duty of great responsibility for that you need to have extreme driving and parking skills. Deliver the Cows and Buffaloes milk from dairy farm to factory by steering the milk cargo truck on big mountains.

Become Extreme Transporter of Milk Tanker of farm milk by driving transporter truck. As a milk delivery driver you need be very careful while mountain climbing and steep hill stations because one wrong turn may cause a big lose of milk cargo truck. Follow the offroad driving symbols to find milk parking area and park your tank appropriately. you may have played other milk transporter games and 3D simulator games but this one is unique due to its specially designed village and hill environments.

This game has multiple challenging levels for testing your driving skills. Can you complete them all in limited time and without any collision? Show your off-road driving skills and transport Milk safely and complete all thrilling missions of this Simulator game. In these levels you have to face multiple traitor turns and hilly roads movement. Drive a transport truck filled with Pure milk on off-road and twist road is not an easy job, but with this truck simulation you will be a great off-road driver and then you can do this job easily.


Off-Road Milk Tanker Delivery Features:
- 3D environment of village Farms
- 3 unique camera angles to drive the tanker for easy simulation of milk truck
- 3 Easy driving controls from which you can choose according to your driving style
- Beautifully designed adventurous levels for milk supply
- Extreme 3D milk cargo tanks
- Extremely powerful gears for acceleration
- Realistic explosion effects while truck Damage and crash

Enjoy Off Road Milk Tanker Delivery 3D game and let us know about your valuable feedback and suggestions so that we can improve it for our loving fans.
